vote.title: Authorize (1) an Interlocal Agreement with Dallas County to accept $23,600,000.00 in U.S. Department of Treasury Coronavirus Local Fiscal Recovery Funds under the American Rescue Plan Act (ARPA) for the region-wide Dallas R.E.A.L. Time Rapid Rehousing initiative (to provide rapid rehousing assistance for individuals and families who are experiencing homelessness; (2) the receipt and deposit of grant funds in an amount not to exceed $23,600,000.00 in the Dallas County ARPA Coronavirus Local Fiscal Recovery Fund; and (3) the establishment of appropriations in an amount not to exceed $23,600,000.00 in the Dallas County ARPA Coronavirus Local Fiscal Recovery Fund - Estimated Revenue:  Dallas County ARPA Coronavirus Local Fiscal Recovery Fund $23,600,000.00
